00025 #ifndef __GLHARDWAREINDEXBUFFER_H__
00026 #define __GLHARDWAREINDEXBUFFER_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgreGLPrerequisites.h"
00029 #include "OgreHardwareIndexBuffer.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre { 
00032 
00033 
00034     class GLHardwareIndexBuffer : public HardwareIndexBuffer
00035     {
00036     private:
00037         GLuint mBufferId;
00038     protected:
00040         void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00042         void unlockImpl(void);
00043     public:
00044         GLHardwareIndexBuffer(IndexType idxType, size_t numIndexes, 
00045             HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, bool useShadowBuffer); 
00046         ~GLHardwareIndexBuffer();
00048         void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00050         void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, 
00051             const void* pSource, bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00052 
00053         GLuint getGLBufferId(void) const { return mBufferId; }
00054     };
00055 
00056 }
